-- | File manager extension for Manatee.
--   
--   manatee-filemanager is file manager extension for Manatee
--   (Haskell/Gtk+ Integrated Live Environment)
@package manatee-filemanager
@version 0.0.2

module Manatee.Extension.FileManager.PageMode

-- | Dired mode.
diredMode :: PageMode

module Manatee.Extension.FileManager.DiredBuffer
data DiredBuffer
DiredBuffer :: TVar FilePath -> Client -> PageId -> [(FileInfoOption, SortColumnId)] -> TVar [DiredFileInfo] -> TVar (FileInfoOption, SortType) -> TVar FileIconPixbufDatabase -> PageMode -> TChan DiredBufferSignal -> DiredBuffer
diredBufferCurrentDirectory :: DiredBuffer -> TVar FilePath
diredBufferClient :: DiredBuffer -> Client
diredBufferPageId :: DiredBuffer -> PageId
diredBufferFileInfoOptions :: DiredBuffer -> [(FileInfoOption, SortColumnId)]
diredBufferFileInfos :: DiredBuffer -> TVar [DiredFileInfo]
diredBufferSortStatus :: DiredBuffer -> TVar (FileInfoOption, SortType)
diredBufferIconPixbufDatabase :: DiredBuffer -> TVar FileIconPixbufDatabase
diredBufferMode :: DiredBuffer -> PageMode
diredBufferBroadcastChannel :: DiredBuffer -> TChan DiredBufferSignal
data DiredBufferSignal
UpdateBuffer :: FilePath -> DiredBufferSignal
UpdateView :: (Maybe String) -> DiredBufferSignal
data DiredFileInfo
DiredFileInfo :: (String, String) -> (FileType, String) -> (Integer, String) -> (String, String) -> (GTimeVal, String) -> (String, String) -> DiredFileInfo
dfiNameDescrible :: DiredFileInfo -> (String, String)
dfiTypeDescrible :: DiredFileInfo -> (FileType, String)
dfiSizeDescrible :: DiredFileInfo -> (Integer, String)
dfiMimeDescrible :: DiredFileInfo -> (String, String)
dfiMtimeDescrible :: DiredFileInfo -> (GTimeVal, String)
dfiPermDescrible :: DiredFileInfo -> (String, String)
data FileInfoOption
FIName :: FileInfoOption
FISize :: FileInfoOption
FIMime :: FileInfoOption
FIMTime :: FileInfoOption
FIPermission :: FileInfoOption
class DiredFileInfoClass a
getColumnTitle :: (DiredFileInfoClass a) => a -> String
getCellText :: (DiredFileInfoClass a) => a -> DiredFileInfo -> String
getCellXAlign :: (DiredFileInfoClass a) => a -> Float
compareRow :: (DiredFileInfoClass a) => a -> DiredFileInfo -> DiredFileInfo -> IO Ordering

-- | New.
diredBufferNew :: FilePath -> Client -> PageId -> IO DiredBuffer

-- | Listen broadcast channel.
diredBufferListenChannel :: DiredBuffer -> IO ()

-- | Load.
diredBufferLoad :: DiredBuffer -> FilePath -> IO ()

-- | Get file infos.
diredBufferGenerateFileInfos :: [FileInfo] -> IO [DiredFileInfo]

-- | Compare file name.
diredFileInfoNameCompare :: DiredFileInfo -> DiredFileInfo -> Ordering
instance Typeable DiredBuffer
instance Eq FileInfoOption
instance Show FileInfoOption
instance Read FileInfoOption
instance Show DiredFileInfo
instance Show DiredBufferSignal
instance Eq DiredBufferSignal
instance Ord DiredBufferSignal
instance DiredFileInfoClass FileInfoOption

module Manatee.Extension.FileManager.DiredView
data DiredView
DiredView :: TVar PagePlugId -> ScrolledWindow -> DiredBuffer -> TreeView -> ListStore DiredFileInfo -> TypedTreeModelSort DiredFileInfo -> ViewChannel DiredBufferSignal -> DiredView
diredViewPlugId :: DiredView -> TVar PagePlugId
diredViewScrolledWindow :: DiredView -> ScrolledWindow
diredViewBuffer :: DiredView -> DiredBuffer
diredViewTreeView :: DiredView -> TreeView
diredViewListStore :: DiredView -> ListStore DiredFileInfo
diredViewSortModel :: DiredView -> TypedTreeModelSort DiredFileInfo
diredViewBroadcastChannel :: DiredView -> ViewChannel DiredBufferSignal

-- | Internal new function.
diredViewNew :: DiredBuffer -> PagePlugId -> IO DiredView

-- | Listen broadcast channel for draw view synchronous.
diredViewListenChannel :: DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Entry directory.
diredViewEntryDirectory :: DiredView -> FilePath -> Maybe String -> IO ()

-- | Draw dired view.
diredViewDraw :: DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Add file icon.
diredViewAddIconColumn :: (TreeViewClass tv) => tv -> ListStore DiredFileInfo -> FileIconPixbufDatabase -> IO ()

-- | Add column.
diredViewAddColumn :: (DiredFileInfoClass t, TreeViewClass self1, TreeModelClass self, TreeModelSortClass self, TypedTreeModelClass model, TreeSortableClass self) => self1 -> model DiredFileInfo -> self -> (t, SortColumnId) -> IO ()

-- | Set sort function.
diredViewSetSortFunc :: (TreeSortableClass self, TypedTreeModelClass model, DiredFileInfoClass a) => model DiredFileInfo -> self -> (a, SortColumnId) -> IO ()

-- | Set cell text.
diredViewSetCellText :: (CellLayoutClass self, CellRendererTextClass cell, TreeModelClass model, TreeModelSortClass model, TypedTreeModelClass model1, DiredFileInfoClass a) => self -> cell -> model1 DiredFileInfo -> model -> a -> IO ()

-- | Next node.
diredViewNextNode :: DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Previous node.
diredViewPrevNode :: DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Entry.
diredViewEntryNode :: Bool -> DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Entry upper directory.
diredViewUpperDirectory :: Bool -> DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Sort by file name.
diredViewSortByName :: DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Sort by file size.
diredViewSortBySize :: DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Sort by file mime type.
diredViewSortByMime :: DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Sort by modified time.
diredViewSortByMTime :: DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Sort column.
diredViewSort :: DiredView -> FileInfoOption -> IO ()

-- | Internal sort function.
diredViewSortInternal :: DiredView -> (FileInfoOption, SortType) -> IO ()

-- | Keymap.
diredViewKeymap :: Map Text (DiredView -> IO ())

-- | Begin.
diredViewScrollToTop :: DiredView -> IO ()

-- | End.
diredViewScrollToBottom :: DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Scroll page vertically.
diredViewScrollVerticalPage :: Bool -> DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Scroll step vertically.
diredViewScrollVerticalStep :: Bool -> DiredView -> IO ()

-- | Handle key action.
diredViewHandleKeyAction :: DiredView -> Text -> SerializedEvent -> IO ()
instance Typeable DiredView
instance PageView DiredView
instance PageBuffer DiredBuffer

module Manatee.Extension.FileManager
